For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

SentenceSuggestionsInfo(android.view.tex.FullName: public SentenceSuggestionsInfo (SuggestionsInfo[] suggestionsInfos, int[] offsets, int[] lengths)

ClassDesc: This class contains a metadata of suggestions returned from a text service (e.g. @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService_E@). The text service uses this class to return the suggestions for a sentence. See @B_android#view#textservice#SuggestionsInfo_E@ which is used for suggestions for a word. This class extends the functionality of @B_android#view#textservice#SuggestionsInfo_E@ as far as this class enables you to put multiple @B_android#view#textservice#SuggestionsInfo_E@s on a sentence with the offsets and the lengths of all @B_android#view#textservice#SuggestionsInfo_E@s.
